titles.title: Expressing the appreciation of the House of Representatives to the King of Jordan for his efforts to support the Middle East peace process and to condemn efforts within Jordan to further hostility between Jordanians and Israelis by ostracizing and boycotting those individuals who have had any contact with Israel or Israeli citizens.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 10/21/1999--Introduced. Expresses support for the efforts of King Abdullah of Jordan to further the Middle East peace process and condemns efforts within Jordan to oppose normalization of ties with Israel by ostracizing and boycotting those individuals who have had any contact with Israel or Israeli citizens.
